headline: Stock Market Today: Indexes Rise On Surprise Inflation Data; ASML Plunges On This Warning (Live Coverage)
summary: Futures on the Dow Jones Industrial Average and other major indexes were mostly higher Wednesday, as Wall Street digested cooler-than-expected inflation data. Meanwhile, chip stock ASML plunged on the stock market today after the company warned it couldn't guarantee growth in 2026 due to tariff uncertainty.
